code: Hunter's Armor may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
Playing Hunter's Armor does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from a treachery effect, you may exhaust it to draw 1 card.
After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from an enemy attack, you may exhaust it to deal 1 damage to that enemy.
- Glory - If this attack defeats an enemy, choose one: draw 1 card, heal 1 damage, or heal 1 horror.
- Glory - If this attack defeats an enemy, choose one: draw 1 card, heal 1 damage, or heal 1 horror.
- Elders - If this attack succeeds by an amount equal to or greater than your location's shroud, discover 1 clue at your location.
- Elders - If this attack succeeds by an amount equal to or greater than your location's shroud, discover 1 clue at your location.
- Hunt - Immediately move to a connecting location or engage an enemy at your location.
- Hunt - Immediately move to a connecting location or engage an enemy at your location.
- Fury - If this attack is successful, in addition to its standard damage, deal 1 damage to each other enemy engaged with you.
- Fury - If this attack is successful, in addition to its standard damage, deal 1 damage to each other enemy engaged with you.
You may imbue the same inscription up to three times.

When the chosen criteria is met, you may exhaust Empirical Hypothesis to add 1 evidence to it.

When the chosen criteria is met by any investigator at your location, you may exhaust Empirical Hypothesis to add 1 evidence to it. Other investigators at your location may trigger [fast] abilities on Empirical Hypothesis.
[fast] Spend 2 evidence: Reduce the cost of the next card you play by 3.
[fast] Spend 2 evidence: Reduce the cost of the next card you play by 3.
[fast] Spend 3 evidence: Discover 1 clue at your location.
[fast] Spend 3 evidence: Discover 1 clue at your location.
After you exhaust Empirical Hypothesis, you may resolve its forced effect, choosing a criteria you have not chosen this round. Then, ready it.

Mutated. Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - At the start of the round: Choose one of the following criteria for this round - You fail a test by 2 or more. - You succeed at a test by 3 or more.{0} {1}{2} [fast] Spend 1 evidence: Draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.){3}

Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - At the start of the round: Choose one of the following criteria for this round - You fail a test by 2 or more. - You succeed at a test by 3 or more.{0} {1}{2} [fast] Spend 1 evidence: Draw 1 card.{3}
Using attached asset's [action] abilities does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Attached asset does not take up any slots.
You get +2 skill value while performing skill tests on attached asset.
[fast] Exhaust The Raven Quill: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to attached asset.
[fast] Exhaust The Raven Quill: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to attached asset.
After you resolve an [action] ability on attached asset, you may exhaust The Raven Quill to ready another asset you control.
, or you may search your deck, discard pile, and hand for a copy of a named asset and play it (paying its cost). Then, attach The Raven Quill to it

Customizable. {0}.  Attach to a named asset you control{1}.  [reaction] When you resign or the game ends: Either mark a checkbox on The Raven Quill's upgrade sheet, or reduce the experience cost to upgrade the attached asset before the next scenario by 1.{2}
While investigating using Damning Testimony, you may ignore any effect or keyword on the investigated location that would trigger.
You get +2 [intellect] while investigating using Damning Testimony.
When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend 1 evidence to automatically evade the chosen enemy.
You may use Damning Testimony's ability to investigate the chosen enemy's location instead of your location.
When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend X evidence to discard the chosen enemy if it is non-[[Elite]]. X is that enemy's remaining health.

Customizable. Uses ({0} evidence). [action] Exhaust Damning Testimony and choose an enemy at any location: Investigate (your location). If you succeed, you may spend 1 evidence to discover 1 additional clue at the chosen enemy's location.{1}
When you play Friends in Low Places, you may choose another investigator at your location to resolve its effects.
When you play Friends in Low Places, you may choose one of the looked-at cards with both chosen Traits to add to your hand without spending 1 resource.
Each card added to your hand by Friends in Low Places gains a [wild] icon until the end of the phase.
Instead of shuffling the remaining cards into your deck, you may place each of them on the top of your deck, in any order.
You may play one of the cards added to your hand (paying its cost).

Customizable.{0}  {1}  Look at the top {2} cards of your deck. For each looked-at card with the chosen [[Trait]](s), you may spend 1 resource to add that card to your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.{3}

You may activate the parley ability on Power Word from up to one location away from the attached enemy.
You may include three copies of Power Word in your deck. When you give a command using one copy, also give that command to each other enemy with one of your copies of Power Word attached.

Customizable.{0} Uses (2 time). If Makeshift Trap has no time, discard it{1}.{2} Attach to your location{3}. Each non-[[Elite]] enemy at attached location get -1 fight and -1 evade{4}. Forced - At the end of the round{5}: Remove 1 time from Makeshift Trap.{6}

If this is a skill test on or against an enemy with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may attach Grizzled to that enemy. Reduce the difficulty of tests on or against the attached enemy by 1.
If this skill test is on a treachery with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may add both Grizzled and that treachery to the victory display.
After you draw an encounter card with a chosen trait, return one copy of Grizzled from your discard pile to your hand. (Max once per round.)

Customizable. {0}. If this is a skill test on or against an encounter card (including fighting, evading, or parleying), Grizzled gains [wild][wild] for each of the chosen traits that encounter card possesses.{1}
Manifest - Fight. Fight with any skill. This attack deals +1 damage.
Railshooter form: Manifest - Fight. Fight with any skill. This attack deals +1 damage.
Manifest - Investigate. Investigate with any skill. If you succeed, discover a clue at any revealed location instead of your location.
Telescanner form: Manifest - Investigate. Investigate with any skill. If you succeed, discover a clue at any revealed location instead of your location.
Manifest - Evade. Attempt to evade with any skill. Before or after this attempt, you may move an investigator or a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to a connecting location, or vice versa.

Translocator form: Manifest - Evade. Attempt to evade with any skill. Before or after this attempt, you may move an investigator or a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to a connecting location, or vice versa.
Manifest - Test any skill (3). If you succeed, discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
Realitycollapser form: Manifest - Test any skill (3). If you succeed, discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.
Manifest - Choose an asset in your hand and test any skill (X), where X is that asset's cost. If you succeed, play that asset at no cost.
Matterweaver form: Manifest - Choose an asset in your hand and test any skill (X), where X is that asset's cost. If you succeed, play that asset at no cost.
While using a Manifest ability, you get +2 skill value.

Customizable. Uses ({0} aether). If Hyperphysical Shotcaster has no aether, discard it. [action] Spend 1 aether: Resolve the Manifest ability of the Hyperphysical Shotcaster's current form.{1} [fast] Exhaust Hyperphysical Shotcaster: Change its form (to one you have unlocked on its upgrade sheet).{2}
